'''1.7.10 Build 21'''<ref>{{link |url=http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog|title=MinecraftEdu Changelog|date=|website=|author=}}([https://web.archive.org/web/20170207182304/http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog Archive])</ref> is the twenty-first build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released on March 3, 2016. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]].

== Additions ==
* Added Danish, Czech, Italian and French (CAN) translations
* "Give Mining Turtle to All" button to CCEdu admin menu.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Not being able to have more than 10 assignments.
* Hosting Service fixes and optimizations.
